news_header: Nord Pool electricity prices have been negative on Sunday, with expectations of similar trends on Monday due to favorable wind conditions.
news_text: On Sunday, Nord Pool's hourly electricity rates were negative for much of the day, resulting in an average price of -0.01 cents per kilowatt hour. Prices started at 0.51 cents per kilowatt hour and remained negative from 3 a.m. to 4 p.m. On Monday, prices are expected to remain negative until 7 p.m., with a notable spike to 1.88 cents per kilowatt hour at 6 p.m. The low prices are attributed to increased wind power production.
